academicChallenges: Staying focused when there are distractions

shortTermGoals: Balance school work with other responsibilities
longTermGoals: Find a career where I can help people
Make a positive difference in the world

favoriteClassActivities: Writing articles for the school paper
challengingClassActivities: Speaking in front of large groups
Competitive activities where others might get hurt
helpfulAccommodations: Quiet space to work when things get overwhelming

environmentalSupport: Understanding when I might need to step out of class briefly
socialEmotionalSupport: Understanding my unique background and circumstances

additionalComments: I really want to do well in school and use my abilities to help others. Sometimes I feel like I'm different from other students, but I'm trying to find my place. I appreciate teachers who challenge me intellectually while understanding that I'm still figuring out who I am and what I can do with my life.
